name: Jewelry King
description:
Move the Jewelry to match the same 3 pieces
Various Stages with different missions are waiting for you!

[Features]
- brain puzzle game with simple rule
- no play limit such as heart, play as much as you can!
- can play even without network!
- game file is as low as 22M, light-weight download!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 15 languages
